downloadTitle: Azure Active Directory custom branding CSS template
downloadDescription: Customize the sign-in experience that use Azure Active Directory as the identity provider.
detailsSection: For sign-in pages that use Azure Active Directory as the identity provider, organizations can customize the branding, color schemes, and fonts to create a familiar look and feel for customers. This CSS template can be used to customize several details at once.
systemRequirementsSection: Customizing the branding in Azure Active Directory requires the Global Administrator role.
installInstructionSection:
To upload a custom CSS file for you company branding, please refer to the following article:
[https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/how-to-customize-branding#layout]([https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/how-to-customize-branding#layout).
  1. Download and update the CSS template.
  2. From the Layout tab in the Azure Company Branding experience, upload your CSS template.
  3. Select "Review + create" to save the Layout.
